channel.title: LambdaWorld on MonkeyPatch
channel.description: Recent content in LambdaWorld on MonkeyPatch

item.title: Lambda World Cadiz 2018 - A Review
item.description: The Spanish city of CÃ¡diz is an amazing place, with a great history (from Roman ruins, to the first Spanish constitution which was written there back in 1812). It is a great location choice for the Lambda World conference, although a quite remote one. Due to train troubles following the recent Aude flooding back here in France, I missed the first morning unconference and the first workshop (which I sorely regretted since I highly awaited to attend the eta-lang workshop).
